cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum 'invalid_level' will cause logging configuration errors and prevent proper log output.

du.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an invalid value 'invalid_hw' will cause hardware logging failures and system instability.
du.explanation_zh: 將硬體日誌等級設定為無效值 'invalid_hw' 會導致硬體日誌失敗和系統不穩定。
